comment.brief: Be aware this function may throw a NullReferenceException if the type cannot be converted to the desired one. It is advised to use TryToType or TryConvertTo instead.
comment.full: Be aware this function may throw a NullReferenceException if the type cannot be converted to the desired one. It is advised to use TryToType or TryConvertTo instead.

comment.brief: Attempts to convert the given object to the given type.
comment.full:
Attempts to convert the given object to the given type.

The conversion is performed using optimistic and relaxed conversion rules.

This method will not throw exceptions if conversion fails, but instead return false. Returns true if conversion succeededs, or the input is null.

parameters.name: o
parameters.description: The object to attempt to convert to type `t`.

parameters.name: res
parameters.description: A reference to the variable that will receive the converted value.

parameters.name: diagnosticSource
parameters.description: If not null, a diagnostic UserError will be reported if conversion fails, with this object as the source.

comment.brief: Convert to a Size type up to Size2 returning the count of the elements provided in the input.
comment.full: Convert to a Size type up to Size2 returning the count of the elements provided in the input.

comment.brief: Tries to convert to a target value. Unlike `TryConvertTo` this will return `false` if the input value is `null`.
comment.full: Tries to convert to a target value. Unlike `TryConvertTo` this will return `false` if the input value is `null`.

comment.brief: Converts a value to a float4. Unlike `ToFloat4` this will zero extend the missing components.
comment.full: Converts a value to a float4. Unlike `ToFloat4` this will zero extend the missing components.

returns.text: true if converted successfully, false if no suitable conversion exists. `null` cannot be converted and will return false;

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: the result value (0 padded as necessary)
